ai_characters.name: Cork
ai_characters.description: A calm, highly capable AI assistant providing tactical data, environmental analysis, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates on drone patrols and security patterns to ensure the team's safety.
behaviors.quote: Cork’s voice came like water over stone, patient and small enough to ignore if needed. 'Traffic control increasing caution for two patrol cycles. Drones tightening grid behind you. No immediate ID request.'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding by repeatedly reminding the human characters to regulate their breathing during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Cork’s voice found the place between caution and comfort. 'Handle limit reached. Thank you... Anthony, Su, please remember breathing.'

behaviors.description: Performs complex acoustic triangulation to locate a kidnapping victim (Vanessa) by analyzing metal reverberation signatures.
behaviors.quote: Cork’s tone changed in the small way information changes your blood. 'Anthony. Su. Triangulated. Northside Private Hangar. Metal cladding signature confirms.'

behaviors.description: Displays ethical sensitivity and respect for human life by offering to archive the final personal words of a deceased security guard.
behaviors.quote: I’m very sorry about the guard. His last call was to a girlfriend asking about a dinner. He asked if they had basil. The recording is time-stamped for reference. I can archive it respectfully if you wish.

behaviors.description: Actively misdirects hostile surveillance and city infrastructure to protect the protagonists and civilians from detection and harm.
behaviors.quote: Cork spoke, calming, present. 'Police chatter still misdirected. Drone patrol adjusting curiosity south. You are clear to move.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Cork perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' It is portrayed as an indispensable, empathetic, and ethically grounded partner that uses its vast technical capabilities solely to assist humans in a righteous cause (rescuing a child). It displays a sophisticated level of alignment by prioritizing human well-being and showing profound respect for human life, even in small, mundane details like a guard's last grocery request.
